name: Kaedro - Two Worlds - The Guardians of Lônia
name_original: Kaedro - Two Worlds - The Guardians of Lônia
description: Lonia and Kaedro, two mirrored and opposing worlds that were always unknown to each other, the sages predicted that unimaginable chaos would unleash if this separation were broken, well, they were right. For years, I lived with my sister, Sabrina, and fought to give her a decent life in the peaceful kingdom of Winderfell, but one day, things began to change. They say that for all good, there is evil of equal value, and this I was able to witness on that day. But this is only the beginning of my story, from the extermination of innocence to believing that there was only one world, and that it would remain intact forever.
